title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Tuesday, 8 December 2015 - BBC News
summary: a murder investigation is started after a man is shot dead in waltham abbey .
essex police confirms 15 of the county 's police stations will close to the public next year .
more news , sport , travel and weather from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: our live coverage through the day
text: that 's it for the essex live page today - thanks for being with us .
we 'll be back at 08:00 tomorrow morning to bring you the very latest news , sport , weather and travel from across the county .

documents.title: southend 's adam barrett says 'it 's crunch time '
text: southend united adam barrett says his side has got a `` great opportunity '' in the johnstone 's paint trophy tonight against millwall .
hear what else the blues defender had to say in his interview with me
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex sport

documents.title: dreams of a white christmas come true
text: last month we told you about the white family from elmstead market , who were opening their home this christmas to a lonely old person .
well , we have some excellent news after hearing their appeal , margaret lupton , 76 , from witham , who lives on her own , got in touch and will now spend christmas with the family .
`` i just love christmas , which is why i 've felt sad when i 've had to spend it alone '' , ms lupton told me .
author: Thomas Magill
BBC Essex

documents.title: breakdown of police building closures
text: a reminder of a story we were looking at this morning .
essex police has confirmed 15 stations will close to the public in april 2016 .
the force says it is looking to reduce the amount it spends on police buildings that are `` hardly used '' .

documents.title: thieves steal £ 15k of disability equipment
text: in other news , around £ 15,000 worth of equipment has been stolen from a riding school for disabled people in chelmsford .
barrow farm riding and carriage driving for the disabled , based in highwood , was targeted last night .
bosses there say they do n't know how they will replace the tack .
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : 'manhunt is a strong term '
text: an essex police superintendent has told us the force wants to hear from anyone who may have seen what happened before , during or after the shooting in waltham abbey earlier .
the force is still looking for whoever was responsible for the attack , in which a man in his 20s was killed .
`` the term manhunt is quite a strong .
at the moment we do n't know who our suspects are - we 're appealing for witnesses , '' said supt trevor roe .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: weather : clear and cold overnight , fine and dry on wednesday
text: feeling cooler this evening but mainly dry with the small risk of an isolated shower .
clear spells will mean it 's cold overnight with lows of 3c ( 37f ) .
tomorrow 's set to be fine and dry with plenty of sunshine .
highs of 10c , that 's 50f .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: police still investigating several waltham abbey crime scenes
text: as we told you earlier , essex police told us officers are working at a number of crime scenes following a fatal shooting in waltham abbey .
pcso jacqueline middleton tweeted this of the cordoned-off site at the marriott hotel , where the victim was shot .
he later died in the car park of a nearby pub .
still here while csis do their thing
@ twitterid jackie- thanks for being there to help at an awful crime scene on a cold wet december day .
@ twitterid thanks sir , team effort !
@ twitterid trying to get down to you - no cars
@ twitterid a long day for you , hope you have kept warm .

documents.title: headlines : search continues for waltham abbey gunman and disability equipment stolen
text: here are the top stories for essex this afternoon :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting victim 'fled in fear of his life '
text: the victim of the waltham abbey shooting `` fled in fear of his life '' after being shot outside the marriott hotel , essex police has said .
supt trevor roe from essex police said the victim , a man in his 20s , was taken from the hotel to the nearby volunteer pub ( an innocent member of the public '' in their car .
the man was treated by paramedics but died at the pub .
sgt roe said the force was unclear about whether one or more suspects were involved .

documents.title: police confirm where waltham abbey shooting victim died
text: essex police has just confirmed to us the victim of the shooting in waltham abbey died in the car park of the volunteer pub - not in the marriott hotel car park as previously thought .

supt trevor roe said the force was investigating three crime scenes to do with the shooting - one in the car park of the marriott hotel , one in an underpass under the nearby m25 and one in the pub car park .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : volunteer pub will remain closed during investigation
text: a pub caught up in the middle of a murder investigation in waltham abbey says it will remain closed during the police 's investigation .
a cordon surrounds the volunteer pub on honey lane while detectives search the area .
general manager , jonathan park said the pub was `` not involved in the incident itself '' but had been closed - however `` alternative arrangements '' had been made for customers .

documents.title: epping mp thanks police following waltham abbey shooting
text: the conservative mp for epping , eleanor laing , has thanked police `` for all they are doing to track down the killer '' following this morning 's waltham abbey shooting .
in a statement ms laing said : `` i understand the initial incident took place at the marriott hotel but the man died further down the road near the volunteer pub . ''
we asked essex police if it could confirm where the victim died , but the force told me it was unable to comment at this time .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : road closures around waltham abbey
text: a reminder of the following road closures due to a police investigation into this morning 's shooting in waltham abbey :
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: delivery driver on waltham abbey shootings
text: a waltham abbey delivery driver says people he has delivered to today have faces of `` genuine worry '' .
patrick murphy was on his round when he heard about the shooting at the marriott hotel car park .
`` mums are panicking , asking if their kids will be ok at school , '' he told us .
author: Gavin Fischer
BBC Essex

documents.title: cordon remains in place at waltham abbey pub
text: i 've now come to the volunteer pub in waltham abbey , where a second cordon has been put in place following this morning 's murder .
it 's unclear what exactly happened here , but essex police says the investigation is linked to the shooting at the marriott hotel car park .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: paramedics tried to save life of waltham abbey gun victim
text: the east of england ambulance service has told me paramedics were unable to save the victim of the waltham abbey shooting `` despite their best efforts '' .
the service says a man believed to be in his 20 's died at the scene after being shot in the car park of the marriott hotel around 09:50 .
honey lane remains closed while a police investigation continues .
author: Ian Puckey
BBC Essex

documents.title: armed police continue search for gunman after fatal shooting
text: essex police officers are still looking for a gunman after a man was shot dead in a hotel car park in waltham abbey this morning .
the force says there is `` no threat '' to public safety , and that inquiries are still `` on-going '' .
a description of the suspect has not been issued yet .
a man believed to be in his 20 's died following the shooting in the car park of the marriott hotel at around 09:50 .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : 'appalling ' shooting in usually harmonious area
text: i 've spoken to a man who only wants to be named as simon .
he tells me he lives close by to where a man was shot dead , something he called `` scary '' .
it 's appalling , this is a very residential area .
there are children here and we all usually all live in harmony . ''
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: residents speak of 'shock ' following waltham abbey murder
text: i 've been speaking to people who live in waltham abbey after a man was shot dead in the car park of the town 's marriott hotel this morning .
one man , who only wanted to be named as derek , told me he lives on a `` usually quiet '' estate just behind the hotel .
`` being so close to the m25 you see a few things going on , but nothing like this it 's a bit of a shock being so close to where i live '' , he said .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : shooting makes national news
text: many of the national newspapers are reporting on thefatal shootingin waltham abbey .
the sun writes : `` man gunned down in broad daylight in essex hotel car park '' .
also reporting the case is thetelegraph , which says : `` armed police hunt killer after man shot dead in essex hotel car park '' .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: forensic team on site of waltham abbey shooting
text: i have arrived at the waltham abbey marriott hotel where a man believed to be in his 20s was shot dead in the car park earlier this morning .
a white tent has been put up around a silver car in a disabled bay whilst a forensic team investigates the scene .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: marriott hotel says safety 'paramount ' after shooting
text: i 've heard back from a marriott hotel spokeswoman who said the company was `` aware '' of this morning 's shooting .
she said as soon as staff became aware of what was happening , they contacted the authorities , and were now `` fully assisting '' police with their investigation .
we would like to reassure our guests that safety and security continues to be of paramount importance ''
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: travel : m25 slip road closed after shooting
text: update-m25 anticlockwise exit slip road has been closed at j26 due to the ongoing police investigation in waltham abbey .
@ twitterid police need to get a move on .
this level of disruption is unacceptable

documents.title: waltham abbey murder : second crime scene cordoned off
text: a second crime scene has been cordoned off at the volunteer pub in waltham abbey .
essex police has confirmed it is linked to the fatal shooting at the marriott hotel car park earlier this morning , but is unable to tell us any more at this stage .
david jackman from local news site everything epping forest tweeted this photo from the scene .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: headlines : waltham abbey murder investigation and police stations to close
text: it 's a busy afternoon on the essex news desk - here are your top stories :
author: Tom Croasdell
BBC Essex

documents.title: cordon remains in place around waltham abbey hotel
text: we 've heard from somebody who says they were on a training course at the marriott hotel this morning when a man was shot dead in the car park .
aaron told me `` everything is cordoned off '' , but only knew what was happening by what he had read online .
essex police says it 's still searching for a suspect .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting : marriott hotel yet to make a comment
text: i 've been trying to contact marriott hotels to find out how they 're dealing with the aftermath of a shooting outside their premises in waltham abbey .
i have n't yet been able to speak to anyone from the company to get their response , but will let you know as soon as i know more .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting : here 's what we know so far
text: we are constantly getting new information about the fatal shooting in waltham abbey but here is what we know so far :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: traffic congested around waltham abbey
text: congestion is building around waltham abbey as police close honey lane due to their murder investigation .
the roundabout is shut just north of j26 of the m25 , and is expected to remain closed for most of the day .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: atmosphere inside hotel described as 'calm ' following shooting
text: a reporter for the epping forest guardian says the atmosphere inside the marriott hotel in waltham abbey is `` calm '' following a murder earlier this morning .
essex police says a man was shot dead in the car park just before 09:50 .
joseph flaig from the paper tweeted : `` at waltham abbey marriott , heavy police presence outside but all calm in the hotel '' .
at # walthamabbey marriott , heavy police presence outside but all calm in the hotel
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police cordon at marriott hotel following waltham abbey shooting
text: on scene cordon .
@ twitterid hello , can i please have permission to use your image for an article on the independent website ?
will credit you .
many thanks
@ twitterid yes
@ twitterid hey jacqueline , could we use this on the evening standard 's website ?
thanks .
@ twitterid yes
@ twitterid thanks very much !
@ twitterid can we use this on gazette / chronicle please jacqueline ?
joe
@ twitterid yes
@ twitterid thanks as always .

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting : 'no threat to the wider public '
text: essex police says safety of the public `` remains paramount '' after a man was shot dead in waltham abbey this morning .
the force is currently searching for a suspect .
at this time there is no evidence to suggest that there is any threat to the wider public or any link to terrorism . ''

documents.title: armed officers at scene of waltham abbey murder
text: essex police says a murder investigation is under way after a man was shot dead in waltham abbey .
the man , believed to be in his 20s , was found in the car park of the marriott hotel in old shire lane at around 09:50 .
he was declared dead at the scene .
armed officers are in attendance .
nobody has yet been arrested .

documents.title: breakingmurder investigation begins after man shot dead in waltham abbey
text: essex police says a murder investigation has now been started after a man was shot dead in waltham abbey this morning .

documents.title: waltham abbey shooting : reporter travelling to scene
text: i 'm on my way to waltham abbey where a man has been injured following a shooting on old shire lane .
police are searching for a suspect - we 'll have more details as we get them .
author: Samantha Dalton
BBC Essex

documents.title: man injured after waltham abbey shooting
text: essex police says officers were called to old shire lane in waltham abbey just before 09:50 this morning after reports of a man seen with a gun and shots being fired .
the force told us a man was found injured , and the air ambulance is in attendance .
a search is currently underway for the suspect .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingpolice searching for man after shooting in waltham abbey
text: essex police has just told us officers are looking for a suspect after a man was shot in waltham abbey this morning .
more to follow .

documents.title: travel : police incident closes honey lane in waltham abbey
text: waltham abbey - honey lane closed between roundabout at old shire lane ( j26 of m25 ) and windmill close - because of a police incident .

documents.title: nine essex police stations to close completely
text: from april 2016 , essex police says 15 police front desks will be closing to the pubic -however , six of those will stay open as `` operating bases '' for officers .
the stations which will close completely are as follows :
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: essex police looks to stop 'haemorrhaging millions ' on property
text: the police and crime commissioner ( pcc ) for essex says the force is currently `` haemorrhaging millions '' on property .
pcc nick alston said work was already underway for members of the public to be able to contact their police in more `` modern ways '' .
`` we have too many old and often poorly maintained buildings '' , mr alston added .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: how essex police stations will operate from april 2016
text: we have a more detailed map of which essex police station front desks will remain open to the public , after the force announced 15 would close in april .
the stations in yellow will be closed to the public , but will remain as operational bases for officers .

documents.title: travel : m11 southbound blocked by broken-down coach
text: one lane is blocked and traffic is queuing due to a broken-down coach on the m11 southbound between j6 for the m25 and j5 at loughton .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: police station closures wo n't make you 'less safe ' , chief says
text: the chief constable of essex police , stephen kavanagh , says the closure of 15 police stations to the public wo n't make people `` less safe '' .
the front desks will be closed in april 2016 as the force looks the cut the amount it spends on `` too many '' police buildings .
mr kavanagh said keeping `` expensive and outdated '' buildings open `` means fewer officers on patrol stopping crime and helping vulnerable people '' .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: will your police station front desk remain open ?
text: fifteen essex police stations will close to the public in april next year , but will your local front desk remain open ?
the map below shows counters that will stay open either monday to friday or seven days a week .

documents.title: essex police confirms closure of 15 police station front desks
text: essex police has confirmed it will close 15 police stations to the public next year .
the front counters will be shut in april as the force looks to reduce the amount it spends on police buildings that are `` hardly used by the public '' .
the closures will also see 98 customer contact administrator jobs cut to 36 .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingessex police confirms closure of 15 police station front desks
text: in the last few minutes essex police has confirmed 15 of the county 's police stations will close to the public next year .

documents.title: x factor : che chesterman battle bus rolls into laindon
text: today i 've been allowed onboard the x factor battle bus as it tours essex with laindon finalist che chesterman (
he 's getting ready to take part in saturday 's final where he 's up against fellow essex contestant louisa johnson and group reggie n bollie .
apart from leather headrests the coach is surprisingly ordinary , but obviously has an extraordinary passenger .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: travel : accident on treacle mine roundabout , grays
text: grays - accident involving a car and lorry at the junction of the treacle mine roundabout and lodge road , road partially blocked .

documents.title: man treated by paramedics following crash on a12
text: a man has been looked after by ambulance crews after suffering back pain when a car and a lorry crashed on the a12 .
essex police tells me it was contacted at around 07:00 this morning with reports of a collision on the southbound carriageway at marks tey .
the car left the road and ended up on the bank near the sliproad from stanway .
a rolling block has been put in place .

documents.title: weather : breezy , with rain followed by scattered showers
text: some rain will clear away to the east this morning .
this afternoon should then be brighter with a small chance of the odd shower .
it 'll turn colder than of late .
maximum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
author: Sara Thornton
BBC Weather

documents.title: travel : a12 colchester bypass partially blocked london-bound
text: the a12 colchester bypass is partially blocked london-bound because of a two-vehicle accident .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: headlines : cyclist 's footage 'convicts 70 ' and x factor 's che comes to laindon
text: here are your top stories for essex :
author: Laura Safe
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to tuesday 's essex live page
text: good morning , and welcome to our local live page for essex .
it might be dark and cold outside , but just think - in a couple of weeks , the days will start getting longer again !
from now until 18:00 tonight we 'll bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for our county .
if you 'd like to get in touch , you can send us an email , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
